issue.title: com.xunmeng.pinduoduo

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://cd.pddpic.com/volantis-open/mobile-CI-tag/2025-03-05/6a501cab90bdbb7c400a98184b54f225.apk

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是一个叫做“拼多多”的软件，英文名叫做“temu”下面两个域名建议禁止，应该将下面的两个域名添加到Adguard DNS过滤器
ta.pinduoduo.com
th.pinduoduo.com
下面三条规则建议添加到Adguard防跟踪过滤器，你们再看一下图，图中的url是软件为了绕过规则，所以使用IP，我就用这三条规则拦截，目前软件没有异常。url内容中可以看出会上传版本号等等信息，这侵犯隐私，我觉得应该禁止。为了避免以后IP更改导致规则失效，规则应该不包含IP。
||*d4?appid*type*
||*/d?id=*type*
||*/d?dn=*&id*&type=*

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/daf635be-04c5-4e31-b231-f2f0b5e6e061)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/25762a81-5f43-4527-87f4-45204f05dccb)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9243ab92-d73e-4f77-8fe7-42e26c99d8cc)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @BlazDT 是否可以重新处理一下？
@Sergey-Lyapin This is potentially useful to user (a questionnaire with reward), probably we should not block this.

issue.title: pcdn domain

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://hydl.huya.com/mobile/kiwi-android/12.5.25/huya-12.5.25-100687-live.apk

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

你好，我提的这个issue其实与广告无关，但还是想着尝试提一下。在中国很多公司为了节省网络费用，因此就在软件中默认启用pcdn等技术，以此来降低费用，但是中国的网络运营商打击pcdn，有一些用户因为软件的pcdn上传了太多流量，比如一天内上传了几TB，然后导致宽带被限速或者封禁。于是我收集了很多pcdn域名，希望能够添加到Adguard DNS过滤器中，这个pcdn很恶心，影响到不少人了。下面的部分域名出现在上面下载链接对应的软件

ws-p2p.pull.yximgs.com^                                  
ws-p2p-pull.live-voip.com^
ws-p2p-v2.pull.yximgs.com^
ws-p2p-pull.video-voip.com^
hw-p2p-v2.pull.yximgs.com^
hw-p2p-pull.video-voip.com^
hw-p2p.pull.yximgs.com^
hw-p2p-pull.live-voip.com^
tx-p2p.pull.yximgs.com^
tx-p2p-pull.video-voip.com^
tx-p2p-v2.pull.yximgs.com^
tx-p2p-pull.live-voip.com^
ali-p2p.pull.yximgs.com^
ali-p2p-v2.pull.yximgs.com^
ks-p2p.pull.yximgs.com^
ks-p2p-v2.pull.yximgs.com^
qn-cdnfile1pcdn.msstatic.com^
pp-cdnfile1pcdn.msstatic.com^
qn-fileserverpcdn.cdn.huya.com^
qn-hydlpcdn.cdn.huya.com^
xy-fileserverpcdn.cdn.huya.com^
xy-cdnfile1pcdn.msstatic.com^
xy-livewebbs2pcdn.msstatic.com^
qn-livewebbs2pcdn.msstatic.com^
fileserverpcdn.cdn.huya.com^
livewebbs2pcdn.msstatic.com^

tp2p.kg.qq.com
p2p.qq.com
p2p.huya.com
p2ptun.qq.com
p2pupdate.gamedl.qq.com
p2pupgrade.gamedl.qq.com
pcdn.yximgs.com
stun.hitv.com
mcdn.bilivideo.cn

上面有一些域名很相似，所以我准备了几条规则拦截。上面的域名是在我手机上发现的，我都在我手机中封禁了，并没有发现有什么异常
`||ws-p2p*pull*com`
`||ts-p2p*pull*com`
` ||hw-p2p*pull*com`
`||ali-p2p*pull*com`
`||ks-p2p*pull*com`
`||p2pup*.gamedl.qq.com`
`||qn-*pcdn.cdn.huya.com`
`||qn-*pcdn.cdn.msstatic.com`
`||xy-*pcdn.msstatic.com`
`||xy-fileserverpcdn.cdn.huya.com`
`||fileserverpcdn.cdn.huya.com`
`||livewebbs2pcdn.msstatic.com`
`||tp2p.kg.qq.com`
`||p2p.qq.com`
`||p2p.huya.com`
`||p2ptun.qq.com`
`||pcdn.yximgs.com`
`||stun.hitv.com`
`||mcdn.bilivideo.cn`



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: wormate.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://wormate.io/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwormate.io%2F) ### Comment > After opening the page for the first time and after starting the game everything works, but after starting the game for the second time, with AdGuard enabled in place of the ad and the second game after the ad there is a black screen, with AdBlock disabled there is game > ad > game2 Username: `@M916163844` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/39b5hteb2se8co4g8wwwkgsk4oscw8013r97gpzenw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s2r1ox29jq8gsg40484wsokg4wcs0s8lwt6e90gk28.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ay3i89zqekg0cw8cwg4ogwsswoskg809e8keiy8h7g.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | Extension System version: | Linux x86_64 Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard,
